content:
Yes, there are several bicycle and scooter rental options for tourists in the Greater Poland Voivodeship. Some popular options include:

1. Bike Trip - this company offers various rental options for bicycles and e-bikes, as well as guided bike tours

2. City Bike Poznań - a bicycle rental service located in the city of Poznań, offering rental bikes and guided tours

3. Rent a Scooter - this company offers scooter rentals in Poznań and other cities in the region

4. Kajakiem.pl - this company offers kayak and bike rentals for tourists in the Greater Poland Voivodeship

5. Bike Rent City - a bicycle rental service located in the city of Konin, offering various types of bikes for rent.

It is always best to do your research ahead of time and book in advance to ensure availability.
